document_data.name: Tad Staslep
document_data.mainbody: '''Tad Staslep''' was a grocer in [[Phlan]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Tad was a portly man with a big appetite. He was always chewing or about to chew something. He knew he was good in his work.
document_data.Activities: Tad run the [[Cockburn's Grocery]], in the residential district of the city, for quite a while. Tad was the largest provider of provisions in the city.{{Cite adventurers league/The Courting of Fire|10}}
